name: 2D Platformer - Finished
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Project.

Modifications:

1. Slightly changed the name, color, and font size of the name of the game. 

2. Made the space ship in the initial menu screen larger and the menu page smaller. 

3. Changed the color of the buttons throughout the game and made them react when clicked.

4. Changed the font size of the words level select on the level select page, emboldened them, and moved them down a bit. 

5. Added both instructions and credits.

6. Created multiple levels. 

Credits:

Created by Vinnie LaPenna
